title: Start
body:
As the little fire looks up, a little blue flame stands above.
The little flame reaches out to the flame and soon the little nameless flame was no longer little.
The power of the blue flame slowly seeps into him.
The nameless flame suddenly turns blue.
Drenched in the power of the flame they choose to recreate a new world where they belong.
A world filled with others just like him all around.
However creating a new world comes with a heavy price.
A flame for a flame, a life for a better world.
Soon new little flames emerge and the little flame that was once nameless became a hero.



A hero left to be remembered as a hero.....
To be continued....
Click to restart the game
